H0.text: In 1657, who turned down the opportunity to become King of England. John Lambert

H1.text: In 1657, who turned down the opportunity to become King of England. Edward Montagu

H2.text: In 1657, who turned down the opportunity to become King of England. Thomas Fairfax

H3.text: In 1657, who turned down the opportunity to become King of England. Cromwell

A4.text: In 1657 Cromwell was offered the crown by Parliament as part of a revised constitutional settlement
